official_title: To reinstate the eligibility of certain nonaccredited institutions of higher education for financial assistance under the Higher Education Act of 1965.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to reinstate the eligibility of certain nonaccredited institutions of higher education for financial assistance programs.
